channel.title: social network benchmark on Linked Data Benchmark Council
channel.description: Recent content in social network benchmark on Linked Data Benchmark Council

item.title: SNB Interactive Part 2: Modeling Choices
item.description: â€‹SNB Interactive is the wild frontier, with very few rules. This is necessary, among other reasons, because there is no standard property graph data model, and because the contestants support a broad mix of programming models, ranging from in-process APIs to declarative query.

item.title: Event Driven Post Generation in Datagen
item.description: As discussed in previous posts, one of the features that makes Datagen more realistic is the fact that the activity volume of the simulated Persons is not uniform, but forms spikes.

item.title: The LDBC Datagen Community Structure
item.description: This blog entry is about one of the features of DATAGEN that makes it different from other synthetic graph generators that can be found in the literature: the community structure of the graph.
